H0.text: In which year did Foinavon win the Grand National. 1955

H1.text: In which year did Foinavon win the Grand National. 1961

H2.text: In which year did Foinavon win the Grand National. 1963

H3.text: In which year did Foinavon win the Grand National. 1967

A4.text: In the 1967 Grand National, Foinavon became a surprise winner after a chaotic race where many competitors were eliminated due to the challenging course conditions.
